snippet: Rafael Nadal pulled out of Wimbledon on Thursday, citing the left wrist injury that forced him out of the French Open....
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal pulled out of Wimbledon on Thursday, citing the left wrist injury that forced him out of the French Open.

headline.print_headline: Rafael Nadal to Miss Wimbledon Because of Wrist Injury
headline.main: Rafael Nadal to Miss Wimbledon Because of Wrist Injury
